eg.document

Class TypingEdit

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.TypingEdit

  • public class TypingEdit
extends java.lang.Object
    The mediation between the editing of the document the actions that happen in response

        Makes a text change
        Parameters:
        tc - the TextChange

      • highlightAtPos

        public void highlightAtPos()
        Highlights text in a section around the position where a change happened. The exact range is defined by the Highlighter for a given language.

      • highlightInsertion

        public void highlightInsertion()
        Highlights text in a section that may be multiline. The exact range is defined by the Highlighter for a given language.

      • resetInChangeState

        public void resetInChangeState()
        Resets the state which indicates that the text has been changed

      • setIndentUnit

        public void setIndentUnit(java.lang.String indentUnit)
        Sets the indent unit which consists of spaces
        Parameters:
        indentUnit - the indend unit

        public java.lang.String getIndentUnit()
        Gets the current indent unit
        Returns:
        the indent unit

      • disableBreakpointAdding

        public void disableBreakpointAdding(boolean b)
        Disables or re-enables adding breakpoint to define undoable units
        Parameters:
        b - true to disable, false to re-enable
        See Also:
        UndoEdit.disableBreakpointAdding(boolean)

      • readEditingState

        public void readEditingState()
        Reads the current editing state by calling the methods defined in EditingStateReadable
        See Also:
